reviews.title: Adware
reviews.comment: This app installs adware on your home screen and replaces your browser home page. And for all of that you get a poorly written document with data you can find on the web with a little effort. There are better and more acceptable ways to monetize an app.  I am very suspicious of how they are getting these 5 star ratings for such a poor \'app\'.
